text: Barabara nahim ho sakade sinam karana baithe rahina vale imana vale ate uha imana vale jihare alaha de raha vica apane mala ate jana de sahita larana vale hana. Jana ate mala de sahita yudha karana vali'am da daraja, alaha ne baithe rahina vali'am di tulana vica uca kara rakhi'a hai. Hareka nala alaha neki da va'ada kita hai. Alaha ne jihada karana vali'am nu baithe rahina vali'am nalom fala vica vadi vadi'a'i diti hai
